title: How much money does Google play store give on downloading an app to owner? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey there, It is a myth going on which says that android developers who publish their app in Google playstore get paid on per app install basis. This is completely FAKE!! To get paid there are 3 main sources:- AdSense for the app (main source for small developers)Paid appsIn app purchases
Google does noy pay for downloads instead you have to pay 25$ for playstore developer account. If you want to earn from your apps, it can be done in 3 ways. Paid app, in app purchases and adsense.
